game.name: Castel Run
game.description:
This time you are going to enter into a castle that is full of multiple obstacles! No one is going to help your character except you who is brave enough to accept any fighting challenge! Your good performance will depend upon how wisely you control your character to run and escape from this dangerous place. Join Castel Run and gear up to show off your intense running abilities like never before! A little soldier is waiting for your help so try to react fast!

In this cool adventure game, you would have to control a little solider and help him to go as far as possible. He will be welcomed with plenty of deadly obstacles and enemies to face off. Make sure to grab as many stars as you can to boost your character and score. Do not forget to collect the keys to unlock the exit gate. Put your quick reflexes and concentration abilities to the test to make his way through the castle in this cool html5 running game!

Get ready to play the character of a knight and clear the castle from all the dangerous warriors! Keep your eyes on the meters to track how many meters you can survive! He has been trapped mistakenly in a castle. Your little bit guidance will help him to escape and become a true warrior. This is an endless runner game so you can play this adventure game online for many hours until you set the highscore and get a huge position on the leaderboard.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Castel Run at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP CLICKING L CLICK OF MOUSE TO FLY
